lenders.name: Kati

"... whenever I change a ten-shilling note a little of that rust and corrosion is rubbed off; fear and bitterness go. Indeed, I thought, it is remarkable, what a change of temper a fixed income will bring about. Food, house and clothing are mine for ever. (...) I need not hate any man; he cannot hurt me. I need not flatter any man; he has nothing to give me."

-Virginia Woolf: A Room of One's Own

lenders.name: Patricia
lenders.occupational_info: Keep planes separated as they fly through the sky.

lenders.name: Drew Hartley
lenders.loan_because:
I want to make a difference in the world by Encouraging Work. 

I believe that the best way to escape poverty is by working hard. 
I believe that free handouts that reinforce laziness are not the answer. 
I believe the proverb: "Give a man a fish and you feed him for a day; teach a man to fish and you feed him for a lifetime." 

My goal is to feed people for their lifetime by supporting those that want to work.
lenders.occupational_info: I am in a IT management development program focused on application development and project management.

lenders.name: Will
lenders.loan_because: Jesus showed me insurmountable grace and generosity, therefore I have grace and generosity to share with others.

lenders.loan_because: I want to.

lenders.loan_because: I feel that everyone should help everyone

lenders.name: Julian

lenders.name: Carole
lenders.loan_because: I like to help other people start up their own business

lenders.name: craig

lenders.name: Gerard, Andrea &Ty
lenders.loan_because: We feel that it is important to support others to achieve their aims.
lenders.occupational_info: We own a Learn to Swim School, where we teach children to swim.  As we live in Queensland in Australia it is very important that all children learn to swim because our climate is very hot and a large number of houses have pools in their back yards.  Queensland is a very coastal area where many families holiday at the beach.  We have a small swim school where we teach around 700 children a week in swimming lessons.  Our pool in indoor and heated and it operates year round - closing only over the Christmas period.

lenders.name: William
lenders.loan_because: I am where I am because in the past, people with nothing to gain from helping me reached out to assist me.  I wish to return the favor.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in the secondary mortgage market industry.  The work that I do on a daily basis in some small way helps others obtain financing so that they can provide homes for their families.

lenders.name: Kurt
lenders.loan_because: We need to be there for each other.
lenders.occupational_info:
I don't have that much money, but I understand that things are relative and that my money goes a long way in other parts of the world. I've written a book on philosophy and environmental issues (namely urban sprawl and overpopulation) which I am currently working to publish and I'm also co-writing a screenplay. I usually only lend to people who have had 2 children or less...

I hope you'll look at people working low-paying jobs a little differently.

lenders.name: Merin

lenders.name: Lisa
lenders.loan_because:
WWJGD?  What would John Galt do?  I am a Producer - "Not a looter"

I love entrepreneurs!  They are producers!  Woo-Hoo!  Entrepreneurs keep the engine of the world going with their hard-work ethic, determination, positive outlook, and productivity.  BIG LOVE TO THE ENTREPRENEUR!  TAKE A RISK AND INVEST IN A PRODUCTIVE  - HARSH CIRCUMSTANCE OVERCOMER!  Entrepreneurs are self-reliant and  are awesome hardworking virtuous people!  They do not ask for alms - they start, sustain,  and expand useful and needed businesses, farms, and services.  They just want to work hard and support themselves and their families.  That is exactly how I feel!  OUTSTANDING!  YEAH! 
 
They are my heros!  

"Who is John Galt?" 

THEY ARE JOHN GALT!

Never give up - keep producing!
lenders.occupational_info: Entrepreneurial Training, International Trade Support, Language Training, Business Research and Technical Writing.

lenders.loan_because: I was given a gift certificate.  I really like the idea and want to see how it works.

lenders.loan_because: I know it's an effective way to change the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach nurses seeking higher degrees to enhance their knowledge and skills to become better nurses.

lenders.loan_because: I think its the right thing to do, and want to help where I can.

lenders.occupational_info: A tubby lumpkin

lenders.name: Eric
lenders.loan_because: I watched a program on public television about kiva, and could not wait to participate.

lenders.name: Matthew
lenders.loan_because:
I feel a personal responsibility to give back in some way.
I love the idea of helping and being able to select a country where I have friends or have had a personal experience in a given community; this knowledge of an area adds to the joy of giving.
lenders.occupational_info: I work at Mount Rainier National Park located in Washington State. The park contracts concessionaire's to provide services to visitors. I work as a manager for the concessionaire at Mount Rainier. This company manages The National Park Inn, Paradise Inn, Jackson Visitor Center, and Sunrise Lodge.

lenders.name: Blake
lenders.loan_because: it makes me feel goog

lenders.name: P.J.
lenders.loan_because: Microfinance has the power to turn a couple hundred bucks I'd otherwise spend on disposable triffles into a foundation for economic development.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an investment banker focused on sustainable infrastructure sectors.

lenders.name: www.AngelPartnersltd.com
lenders.loan_because: We lend to empower entrepreneurs to reduce, reuse and recycle, these are the values of our company.
lenders.occupational_info: We provide a chinese procurment service for wind turbines and solar collectors for UK energy service companies.

lenders.name: Kurt B.
lenders.loan_because: I am blessed to have the ability to share some of what I possess with those who need more to build and nurture their dream.
lenders.occupational_info: I am in the business of promoting travel to my destination, which is the home of Thomas Jefferson and, Dave Matthews.  When you love the community where you live, and are paid to promote to prospective visitors, one could hardly ask for more!

lenders.name: Brenda
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Sally
lenders.loan_because: I am so grateful for the good in my life.  I want to support others who aspire to reach their dreams.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a membership association and communicate with the members.  I am also a leader of prayer in my church.

lenders.name: Carrie
lenders.loan_because:
1) My friend asked me to.
2) I believe in empowering people.
3) Everyone deserves the opportunity to be productive.

lenders.name: Anya
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference for someone in a different country.
lenders.occupational_info: I am writing about kiva for my social studies project.

lenders.name: Kate
lenders.loan_because: I want to be connected to the people of our world and make it a better place.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a teacher of 1st grade girls (6 and 7 year olds) in Atlanta, Georgia.

lenders.name: Daniel
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a student right now, studying international relations and business.  I hope to work overseas when I graduate.

lenders.name: Teri & Bob Byrne
lenders.loan_because: We want to help those less fortunate that are in need. We believe in rewarding hard work with encouragement to grow. A small amount can make a huge difference, especially in Third World Countries. We want to help people fight oppression and gain their emotional & financial freedom.

lenders.name: luan
lenders.loan_because: I believe in humanity and equal opportunity for all

lenders.name: Chrysten
lenders.loan_because: I loan in order to provide the helping hand that is usually hard to find.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for an online reatiler. We sell things that people use to improve their homes. I ensure the orders process and are updated quickly.

lenders.name: monica
lenders.loan_because: i'm not making that much money...but if i can lend, why not?

lenders.name: Petra
lenders.loan_because: It's an easy way to help people improving their lives...

lenders.loan_because: Kiva is one of the best ideas I've ever heard of
lenders.occupational_info: I work as a sports editor for a daily newspaper

lenders.name: joel

lenders.name: Victoria

lenders.occupational_info: Being a student definitely isn't the best but I want an education, so i can even make a bigger difference in the world when I am older.

lenders.occupational_info: I started Talking2Trees LLC to provide Arborists and small communities in the U.S. access to efficient and cost effective tools to manage urban forests.  Talking2Trees is an iPad app currently in development.  I hope to complete the app in September 2012
